short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to save articles for later reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Article Vault - Your Personal Article Organizer

Article Vault is a simple and efficient Chrome extension designed to help you save and organize your favorite online articles. With just a click, you can save articles along with custom tags, making it easy to categorize and retrieve them later. Whether you're researching for a project, collecting reading materials, or just want to bookmark something for later, Article Vault has you covered.

Key Features:

Save Articles with Tags: Easily save articles with custom tags for better organization.
Instant Search & Filter: Quickly find articles by tags or by scrolling through your saved list.
Random Tag Colors: Enjoy visually distinct tags with randomly generated colors.
Duplicate Detection: Prevents you from saving the same article twice.
Compact and User-Friendly Interface: A simple and intuitive interface designed for quick access and easy management of your saved content.
Perfect for students, researchers, professionals, and avid readers who want to keep their online resources organized and accessible.
